channel.title: Need help finding this shade color
channel.description: Hi guys, I was checking out a new server today. I logged on and when I logged in, it showed my username with a cool shade color (here it is) http://prntscr.com/1bet2i When I do a shade for my server its a black and the color I want -> http://prntscr.com/1beulp See how its green and black? I want to change the black color

item.title: Need help finding this shade color
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

sigh I really need to make that app…

- Colors the Text. - Adds shading to the text. Example (not real): TextHere would look like: TextHere TextHere would look like[shadow=blue,left]TextHere[/shadow] Put them together: TextHere would look like[shadow=blue,left]TextHere[/shadow]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help finding this shade color

item.title: Need help finding this shade color
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Got a compiler error , [code]package server.model.players.Content;

import server.Server;
import server.model.players.*;

/**

  • Handles all Login Messages

  • @author Gabbe
    */
    public class LoginMessages {

    public static void handleAllLoginMessages(Client c) {
    handleHack3r©;
    handleDonator©;
    handlesDonator©;
    handleDice©;
    handlePlayer©;
    handleMod©;
    handleAdmin©;
    handleOwner©;
    handleeDonator©;
    handleeDonator2©;
    handleeDonator3©;
    }
    public static void handleHack3r(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“brandon”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<col=0458456>Main-Owner Brandon has just logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleDonator(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.issDonator == 0) {
    c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>Donator “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has Just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handlesDonator(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.issDonator == 1) {
    c2.sendMessage("<col=225><shad=255>Super Donator “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has Just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleMod(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerRights == 1) {
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=255><img=0>Moderator “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleAdmin(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerRights == 2) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=200000000><img=1>Administrator “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleOwner(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kannon”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=330000><img=1>Co-Owner “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleOwner(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lexxi”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=330000><img=1>Smexxi exxi “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handlePlayer(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerRights == 0) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>Player “+c.playerName.toLowerCase()+” Has just Logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleDice(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“brandon”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000>Smexy Main Owner Brandon has just logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleeDonator(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wiz khalifa”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=8232128>Extreme Donator Wiz Khalifa has Just logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleeDonator2(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“godemis”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=8232128>Extreme Donator Godemis has Just logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    public static void handleeDonator3(Client c) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
    Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“raven”)) {
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=8232128>Extreme Donator Raven has Just logged in!");
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }[/code] That is the login message with the format u gave me. Its on the first login message

And here is the pic of compiler error http://prntscr.com/1bewi8

Read full topic
item.source: Need help finding this shade color

item.title: Need help finding this shade color
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The “Black color” isn’t because of the shading.
You need to use <col=DecimalColorFormatHere>Text

Read full topic
